[DQC.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 94,038,000 reported in the network role https://www.mediaset.es/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-210000 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 94,038,000 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role https://www.mediaset.es/xbrl/role/all/ias_1_role-610000. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of TreasuryShares : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/95980020140005021479/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31.zip/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31/reports/95980020140005021479-2020-12-31.html 209
